ygData.subject: Re: Kithicor Travels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: scott brisko  To:  Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 3:14 PM Subject: [eqbards] Kithicor Travels ... corpses
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: scott brisko <scott@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 3:14 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Kithicor Travels


> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
> I made lvl 16 last night and thought I would head over to Highhold from
> Oasis to pick up Aquatic Ayre. Having heard the stories about the GM event
> and all the undead that had spawned in Kithicor I was more than a little
> edgey about travelling through the forest.
>
> As I entered the zone from West Commons the ground was covered with
corpses
> that had yet to be reunited with their owners, needless to say this did
not
> make me feel any better. I kicked up Selo's said a silent prayer to Karana
> and bolted down the path to the South. Just passing the HighHold marker I
> got a tell from someone asking me to hold a sec, so I did and was greeted
by
> a Ranger who was looking for someone to do a corpse retrieval for a
friend.
>

Why take the path? I've always found it easier (and probably safer in these
times) to stay on the wall.

>
> Bernwyn
